docs.snippet: Britain's top share index bounced back on Tuesday following two straight sessions of steep losses as insurers and banks, hit hard in the aftermath of Britain's decision to leave the European Union, led the market higher....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's top share index bounced back on Tuesday following two straight sessions of steep losses as insurers and banks, hit hard in the aftermath of Britain's decision to leave the European Union, led the market higher.

headline.main: FTSE Rebounds After Post-Brexit Slump, Insurers Lead
headline.print_headline: FTSE Rebounds After Post-Brexit Slump, Insurers Lead

docs.snippet: The United States looks unlikely to follow through on a threat to relegate Britain to second-class trade status once its ally leaves the European Union, as it weighs the potential costs of undermining the countries' close diplomatic and military t...
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States looks unlikely to follow through on a threat to relegate Britain to second-class trade status once its ally leaves the European Union, as it weighs the potential costs of undermining the countries' close diplomatic and military ties.

headline.main: Analysis-U.S.-UK Alliance Seen Outweighing Brexit Trade Concerns
headline.print_headline: Analysis-U.S.-UK Alliance Seen Outweighing Brexit Trade Concerns
